name: Lee Sin
title: The Blind Monk
description: A versatile jungler with high mobility and playmaking potential

p.name: Flurry
p.description: Lee Sin gains attack speed after casting an ability

q.name: Sonic Wave / Resonance
q.description: Lee Sin throws a sonic wave that damages enemies. He can follow up to dash to them.

w.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
w.description: Lee Sin dashes to an ally or gains a shield

e.name: Tempest / Cripple
e.description: Lee Sin sends out a shockwave that damages and slows enemies

r.name: Dragons Rage
r.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful kick that damages and knocks back an enemy

assassin.name: Assassin Build
assassin.description: High burst damage for one-shot potential

combos.name: Insec Kick
combos.description: Combo clásico: Q, seguir, R para patear al enemigo hacia atrás

tips: Master the Insec kick for playmaking
Use Q to scout and engage
Your W can save teammates - use it wisely
Early ganks are crucial for snowballing
